page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7 o'clock every morning. I am the first to wash. My mum goes to work at the same time as we go to school, and my dad leaves just after us. On Saturdays I get up later than usual and get woken by my mum yelling up the stairs! My mum and dad are in their 30's but act as if they were 20. My dad buys 'trendy' trousers and shirts to our approval. My mum is trendy too. sarah, my sister, bosses me around a bit and we are always arguing. I have a cat, Poppy, and some frogs. Sarah and I spend Saturday mornings down town wasting our money. Both my sister and I are mad on Wham! and spend hours arguing about who has the most posters. I love my family and would never change them.
